byline.contributor: Nicola Clark contributed reporting from Paris.

abstract: German regulators withdraw approval for takeover of semiconductor manufacturer Aixtron by Chinese firm Fujian Grand Chip; withdrawal of approval coincides with growing concerns over Chinese takeover of German technology companies.

keywords.value: Fujian Grand Chip Investment Fund LP
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: It was not clear why regulators reversed their decision, but it comes as concerns rise about Chinese firms acquiring cutting-edge companies.
snippet: It was not clear why regulators reversed their decision, but it comes as concerns rise about Chinese firms acquiring cutting-edge companies....

headline.main: Germany Withdraws Approval for Chinese Takeover of Aixtron
headline.print_headline: Germany Blocks China in Bid for a Tech Firm
